segments.text: What sort of experience do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to work as a mechanic and I was responsible for the maintenance of all the company vehicles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I worked in Hanson Paper Company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you quit your last job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because the company is far away from home , and I have to study after work so I can't afford to waste time on the road everyday .
segments.speaker: S2
